Module kivakit.serialization.jersey.json
Package com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.jersey.json

Class JerseyGsonSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.jersey.json.JerseyGsonSerializer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader<T>, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<T>
    @Provider
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("application/json")
public class JerseyGsonSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader<T>, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<T>
    Performs serialization compatible with the Jersey REST API via *javax.ws.rs* interfaces.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
